meanings.sent1: The bird's unmewed brought joy to all who saw it fly freely.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper's unmewed of the animals was a daily task.
meanings.sent3: The unmewed of the balloons at the party made them soar high in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her unmewed from the strict rules allowed her to explore new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The prisoner's unmewed after years behind bars was a moment of pure happiness.

meanings.definition: To set free from a cage or enclosure.
meanings.sent1: The kind zookeeper unmewed the injured bird back into the wild.
meanings.sent2: She unmewed the cat from the carrier, and it happily explored the room.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to unmew a rabbit from a hat.
meanings.sent4: The key to the cage was the only thing needed to unmew the trapped bird.
meanings.sent5: The hero's mission was to unmew the captured princess from the tower.
